data.title: inside pages - Nirma University
data.text: Editorial Board Advisor Dr. H.V.Trivedi Dr. K Kotecha Editorial Committee Prof. N. P. Gajjar Prof. Gaurang Raval Prof. Kuntal Patel CONTENTS - From President NITAA - Sixth Sense: Computer Vision Based Wearable & Gesture Information Interface by Pranav Mistry - An interview with TAPAN- A Cinematographer - Reunion of Alumni Members @ Sunnyvale, CA, USA by Swar Shah - Nirma University to Intel Research Labs- A Journey by Gaurang Upasani - VoIP Initiative : Applying Theory to practice by Devarshi Shah - A College of my dreams by Dr B S Munjal - A Teacher, A Student and an Alumnus by Usha Mehta - Higher Studies- A New Experience by Shashvat Thakore - Thank you NIRMA by Nirav Thakkar - Training at TCS : Exploring Opportunities by Jenis Modi - Alumni Activities - Studentsâ€™ Activities - Contact Batch 2008 VOLUME - 8 For the year 2007-2009 All correspondence to NITAA should be made to: Secretary, NITAA Institute of Technology, Nirma University Ahmedabad - 382 481. Phone: (02717) 241911-15 Fax: (02717) 241917 E-mail: alumni.it@nirmauni.ac.in From the Editor's Desk The world today is moving on the wheels of progress. We are advancing at great speeds in different facets of life. This effort to bridge the gap between the students and the institute is a means of encouragement and motivation for everyone. This newsletter is a medium to share the rich experiences of life with the ones who were part of our lives when we all were in Nirma. We are apart but SETU keeps us connected. I hope this bond between us keeps on strengthening and we all remain in touch with each other. So herewith we announce the eighth volume of SETU. This reminds me of may GOD grant us.... The SERENITY to accept the things we can't change.... The COURAGE to change the things we can.... The WISDOM to know the difference We are sure that you all shall find this issue of SETU appealing, exciting and motivating. All the best for your future endeavors. Our Heart-felt thanks to all those who contributed their articles for this issue. Our sincere thanks to Dr. K Kotecha for his invaluable guidance and suggestions. Our special thanks to all those who were directly or indirectly involved in the publication of this issue. NITAA Committee for Year 2008-2009 Office Bearers President Dr. K Kotecha Sr. Vice President Dr. P.H.Shah Member Secretary Prof. N. P. Gajjar Treasurer Mr. Jatin Dave Vice President Mr. Kunal Shah Joint Secretary Mr. Kaushal Buch BOM Members Prof. N.P.Gajjar Prof. H.K.Patel Prof. Saurin Parikh Prof. Gaurang Raval Prof. Parin Shah Prof. Reena Trivedi Mr. Sachin Sehgal Mr. Saurin Pandya Mr. Kaushal Patel Mr Tejas Panchal Mr. Akash Mecwan Mr. Darshan Solanki God doesn't require us to succeed; he only requires that you try. Institute of Technology, Nirma University
